description: With their toes in the sand, families spend time at the beach in San Diego, California.  (Photo by Martin do Nascimento | News21)
Just off the side of California's popular Pacific Coast Highway, an industrial zone is nearly hidden behind a brick wall. (Photo by Martin do Nascimento | News21)
Beachgoers of all ages head to the shoreline, just across the Pacific Coast Highway.  (Photo by Martin do Nascimento | News21)
Pacific Coast Highway, also known as State Route 1, is the main thoroughway along California's famous coastline. (Photo by Martin do Nascimento | News 21)
The San Diego County fair is a months-long event which includes carnival rides, concerts and festivals.  (Photo by Martin do Nascimento | News21)
Upscale housing sits on top of the hills just off of California's Pacific Coast Highway.  (Photo by Martin do Nascimento | News21)
The Oceanside Pier in San Diego County is a popular destination for fishing and tourists. (Photo by Martin do Nascimento | News 21)
